title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 13, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1789 that Ben Franklin wrote his famous phrase “In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1789 that Ben Franklin wrote his famous phrase “In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.”
